ygData.subject: Re: Tracking
ygData.msgSnippet: Tracking is IMO the best skill in the game.  On night me and another 35th level bard were in N Karana hunting Griffenes for our charms and it was amzaing out
ygData.messageBody:
Tracking is IMO the best skill in the game. On night me and another 35th
level bard were in N Karana hunting Griffenes for our charms and it was
amzaing out fast we could depop the zone of any griffs or hill giants that
were unlucky enough to show up on our tracking. There was even a Guide
watching us for part of the night, I guess someone felt we were too
successful :) My partner Ziann had the largest train of the night, he
managed to grab 5 griffawns at once, which were quickly dispatch by our 50th
level shamen.

Rokenn Swiftsong - Karana server

>From: Kevikazzam@...
>Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
>To: eqbards@onelist.com
>Subject: Re: [eqbards] Tracking
>Date: Thu, 11 Nov 1999 12:17:53 EST
>
>
>
> I don't necessarily want to track as good as a ranger, or forage - but I
>WOULD like to be able to have the thing be useful.
><snip>
>
>My track capped out at 100 i believe. and i find it very very useful.
>especially in Solb when there are 40 - 50 people there. I can find that dog
>that just spawned before other people. :)
>
>
>Ulaien Firesong
>lvl 45 bard of tunare
